full_summary:
### Invitation to Tender (ITT) for Rogers Pass Bunkhouse & Highway Operations Unit (HOU) Garage Boiler Replacement

#### Background

Parks Canada invites bids for the replacement of propane boilers at the Rogers Pass Bunkhouse and Highway Operations Unit (HOU) Garage in Mount Revelstoke and Glacier National Park.

#### Description of Work

The work includes:

* Replacement of two propane boilers
* Installation of an axiom feeder tank
* Addition of strategically placed isolation valves

The scope of work is estimated to be between $250,001 and $500,000, exclusive of taxes. 

#### Tender Requirements

* Bidders are required to submit their bids electronically to the following email address: soumissionsami-bidsrpc@pc.gc.ca
* Bids received by fax or in-person will not be accepted.
* Bidders must communicate with the Contracting Authority at least five business days prior to the closing date to request any clarification.
* Bidders who do not attend the site visit will not be precluded from submitting a bid, but may not benefit from any site visit clarifications or updates.

#### Site Visit

A site visit is recommended and will take place on August 30, 2022 at the Rogers Pass compound. Bidders who wish to attend must confirm their participation by August 29, 2022 and provide the name(s) of the person(s) who will attend.

#### Tender Submission

 * Bidders must submit their bids electronically and ensure that the email size does not exceed 15 megabytes.
* Bidders may submit their bids in multiple emails, properly labeled with the solicitation number and project name.
* Bidders must not submit any links to bid documents as this will not be accepted.

### Procurement Documents

 All procurement documents, including addenda, may be obtained from the Government of Canada's tendering service at [www.buyandsell.gc.ca/tenders](www.buyandsell.gc.ca/tenders).

### Contact Information

* Contracting Authority: Kenneth Lacanilao, kenneth.lacanilao@pc.gc.ca
* Phone: 587-832-1894

### Submission Deadline

Tender closing date: September 13, 2022, at 17:00 hours (PDT) 

A late submission will not be considered. The Crown retains the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement.
